title: Where in the world? The Christmas travel quiz
description: From flags to film locations, test your travel knowledge with our fiendish picture quiz (answers at the bottom)Which country were these 2024 films and TV shows shot in? Half a point for each title and half a point for the country Continue reading...
author: Gavin McOwan
excerpt: From flags to film locations, test your travel knowledge with our fiendish picture quiz
text: Questions 1 to 5Which country were these 2024 films and TV shows shot in? Half a point for each title and half a point for the country1 Photograph: Universal Pictures/AP2 Photograph: Netflix34 Photograph: Shanna Besson/Why Not Productions/Pathé Films/France 2 Cinema5 Photograph: HBOQuestions 6 to 11Name these countries from their outlinesQuestions 12 to 16Here are five seminal moments in history – but in which town or city did they occur?Half a point for each location and half a point for the year they happened12 Photograph: AP13 Photograph: Daily Herald Archive/SSPL/Getty Images14 Photograph: Photo 12/Universal Images Group/Getty Images15 Photograph: Evan Vucci/AP16 Photograph: Paul Saltzman/AccuSoft IncQuestions 17 to 22These national flags all feature the sun – which countries do they represent? Composite: AlamyQuestions 23 to 27Identify these cities from their famous mode of transport23 Photograph: Keith Tsuji/Zuma Press Wire/Rex24 Photograph: Alexander Spatari/Getty Images25 Photograph: Florentina Georgescu Photography/Getty Images26 Photograph: Kirill Kudryavtsev/AFP/Getty Images27 Photograph: Alejandro Ernesto/The Guardian The answers1 A The Fall Guy, Australia 2 Ripley, Italy 3 The Outrun, Scotland 4 Emilia Pérez, Mexico 5 House of the Dragon, Wales6 Sri Lanka 7 Mali 8 Croatia 9 Somalia 10 North Korea 11 South Korea12 Ali v Foreman (AKA the Rumble in the Jungle) in Kinshasa, Zaire (now DRC), 1974 13 The Empire Windrush arrives at Tilbury, Essex, 1948 14 Yalta conference, 1945 15 Assassination attempt on Donald Trump, Butler, Pennsylvania, 2024 16 The Beatles in Rishikesh, India, 196817 Bangladesh 18 Uruguay 19 North Macedonia 20 Taiwan 21 Rwanda 22 Nepal23 Hong Kong – Star Ferry 24 Lisbon – tram 25 La Paz – Teleférico or cable car 26 Moscow – metro 27 Manila – jeepney

Questions 1 to 5

Which country were these 2024 films and TV shows shot in?
Half a point for each title and half a point for the country

Questions 6 to 11

Name these countries from their outlines

Questions 12 to 16

Here are five seminal moments in history – but in which town or city did they occur?
Half a point for each location and half a point for the year they happened

12

13

14

15

16

Questions 17 to 22

These national flags all feature the sun – which countries do they represent?

Questions 23 to 27

Identify these cities from their famous mode of transport

23

24

25

26

27


The answers

1 A The Fall Guy, Australia 2 Ripley, Italy 3 The Outrun, Scotland 4 Emilia Pérez, Mexico 5 House of the Dragon, Wales

6 Sri Lanka 7 Mali 8 Croatia 9 Somalia 10 North Korea 11 South Korea

12 Ali v Foreman (AKA the Rumble in the Jungle) in Kinshasa, Zaire (now DRC), 1974 13 The Empire Windrush arrives at Tilbury, Essex, 1948 14 Yalta conference, 1945 15 Assassination attempt on Donald Trump, Butler, Pennsylvania, 2024 16 The Beatles in Rishikesh, India, 1968

17 Bangladesh 18 Uruguay 19 North Macedonia 20 Taiwan 21 Rwanda 22 Nepal

23 Hong Kong – Star Ferry 24 Lisbon – tram 25 La Paz – Teleférico or cable car 26 Moscow – metro 27 Manila – jeepney
